MAN.TITLE: set
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: set a property value of a graphic entity object or of a User Interface object.

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a handle, the handle of the entity which to set a property up
n : an integer, the handle of User Interface object which to set a property up
: character string name of the property
: value to give to the property (see graphics_handle)

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine can be used to set a graphics entity specified property. Property name are character strings. The type of the value field depends on the property one aims at setting.
see graphics_handle for detail about property names and values for graphics entities
see uicontrol for detail about property names and values for User Interface objects.
For graphics entities handle it is possible to use equivalently a dot notation like h.background instead of set.

MAN.EXAMPLE: set("figure_style","new") // select entity based graphics t=1:10;plot2d(t,t.^2), h=get("current_figure") //gets handle on the current figure set(h,"figure_size",[300,200]) set(h,"background",addcolor([0.3,0.3,0.3]))
